component.name: Beaker
component.summary: A browser for the next-generation Web

description.p: Beaker is an experimental browser for exploring and building the peer-to-peer Web.

ul.li: Fixed a persistent freezing issue. Sorry about that everyone!
Fix: Favicons should now render correctly
Fix: URL will no longer overflow the navbar
Fix: URL will no longer swap to items loading within the page
Fixed an issue where Beaker would fail to close in Windows and Linux
Fixed an issue where the url bar suggestions would not accept clicks
Fix: Devtools no longer opens a “chrome-devtools://“ tab when popping out
Fix: Windows and Linux now correctly show the new beaker logo image
Fix: A weird little window no longer shows up during startup on Windows
